item.title: 2021 work retrospective
item.description: At the end of the year, people typically list down their New Year’s resolutions in anticipation for the new year ahead. On the other hand, I prefer looking back at the things I’ve done over the past year. I enjoy using that as guidance to what I should continue or discontinue doing. My typical plan is this — keep pursuing new, interesting things over the year, write down accomplishments and disappointments, and look at the list at the end of the year.

item.title: hello world
item.description: My first post. I am set this up using Hugo and am using the Hermit theme. I did not realize it was this simple to set up a blog from nothing.
